snippet: Andy Warhol paintings of Elvis Presley and Marlon Brando will be put up for sale in November at Christie’s.
abstract: Carol Vogel Inside Art column; two seminal 1960s Andy Warhol paintings are up for sale at Christie's Rockefeller Center auction house and are estimated to bring in combined $140 million; artist John Gerrard is transforming Lincoln Center's Josie Robertson Plaza with Solar Reserve (Tonopah, Nevada) 2014, installation that incorporates LED displays; artist duo FriendsWithYou creates installation Light Cave in front of NYC's Standard Hotel.
lead_paragraph: Andy Warhol paintings of Elvis Presley and Marlon Brando will be put up for sale in November at Christie’s.

headline.main: Warhol’s Presley and Brando Head to Auction
headline.print_headline: Warhol’s Presley and Brando Head to Auction
